snippet: Max Clifford, the influential British publicist best known for managing the reputations of celebrities, was sentenced Friday to eight years in prison for a string of indecent assaults on four women.
lead_paragraph: Max Clifford, the influential British publicist best known for managing the reputations of celebrities, was sentenced Friday to eight years in prison for a string of indecent assaults on four women.

headline.main: Britain: Publicist Sentenced for Assaults on Women
headline.print_headline: Britain: Publicist Sentenced for Assaults on Women
